The '''End barrens''' biome is a biome used to generate the [[Terrain features#Outer island|outer End island]]s.

== Description ==
This biome generates as part of the outer islands of [[the End]], forming the outer edges of [[End midlands]] and [[End Highlands|highlands]], with steep cliffs below the edge. Neither [[end cities]] nor [[chorus tree]]s can generate in this biome.
